content:
Hi all -- we just posted a blog post on all the work that has happened in the Cranelift project in 2021. It was really fun to write up and remember all of the cool work folks have done; please read and share!

Cranelift Progress Report: A Look Back at 2021
The past year has been a productive one for the Cranelift project! Cranelift is the Bytecode Allianceâ€™s native code compiler that serves as the foundation for the Wasmtime and Lucet WebAssembly virtual machines, and is used in other cont...
